body.p: IAS 38.5442 requires expenditure on research (or on the research phase of an internal project) to be recognised as an expense when incurred. The examples provided in IAS 38.5644 are similar to the activities undertaken in the Planning stage of a web site’s development. Consequently, expenditure incurred in the Planning stage of a web site’s development is recognised as an expense when incurred.
